General: - Fixed shotgun heroes applying buildup effects like toxic bullets instantly on ricocheted enemies
- Parrying a Guardian now causes it to stop trying to repeatedly melee (and get parried over and over), and instead causes the boss to start shooting shortly there after

Ivy: - Air Drop now silences the ally being carried until they are released
Shiv: - Bloodletting incoming damage deferred reduced from 40% to 35%

High-Velocity Mag: - Fixed High-Velocity Mag affecting some abilities
Silence Glyph: - Spirit damage scaling reduced from 1.5 to 1.0
Return Fire: - Bullet damage returned reduced form 80% to 70%
Siphon Bullets: - Dying with Siphon Bullets stacks will now cause you to lose 2 stacks no matter who killed you (rather than returning 1 only if the victim killed you back)
- Fixed Siphon Bullets acting as spirit damage for procs
